text: Birthdays (生日) are the topic of this Chinese dialogue.Learn how to ask what presents your friend might want!姐姐：妹妹，你的生日快到了。妹妹：对！是后天，我想要生日礼物！姐姐：你想要什么？手表吗？妹妹：不是，你再猜。姐姐：是自行车吗？妹妹：对！我想要一辆黑色的自行车。姐姐：好的，我给你买。Big sister：Sister, it is your birthday soon.Little sister：Yes! The day after tomorrow. I want birthday presents!Big sister：What do you want? A watch?Little sister：No, guess again.Big sister：A bike?Little sister：Correct! I want a black bike.Big sister：Ok, I will buy one for you.1 – 妹妹生日在什么时候？a. 今天b. 明天c. 大后天d. 后天2 – 妹妹想要什么颜色的自行车？a. 红色b. 黑色c. 蓝色d. 黄色1. d2. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
